ISSUE.TITLE: Cert Parser Fails inside Docker
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## EXPLANATION OF THE ISSUE I just downloaded the latest Docker version (2018-11-27) to reproduce the error I found. I get this message when I try to analyze a specific apk. The ipa- version of the same app works fine. > Don't Play Around. An Error just popped in! > Inappropriate argument type. > > 'NoneType' object does not support item assignment `[2018-11-27 09:52:42] [ERROR] Reading Code Signing Certificate (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/cert_analysis.py, LINE 65 "dat = subprocess.check_output(args)"): Command '['/usr/bin/java', '-jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/tools/CertPrint.jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/uploads/1cede86d5ee2833204448a5d6831fed8/META-INF/1.RSA']' returned non-zero exit status 1.` ## CONTENTS OF LOG FILES `[2018-11-27 09:49:28] [ERROR] Reading Code Signing Certificate (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/cert_analysis.py, LINE 65 "dat = subprocess.check_output(args)"): Command '['/usr/bin/java', '-jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/tools/CertPrint.jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/uploads/1cede86d5ee2833204448a5d6831fed8/META-INF/1.RSA']' returned non-zero exit status 1. [2018-11-27 09:50:37] [ERROR] Saving to DB (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/db_interaction.py, LINE 218 "CERT_INFO=cert_dic['cert_info'],"): 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable [2018-11-27 09:50:37] [ERROR] Rendering to Template (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/db_interaction.py, LINE 105 "'certinfo': cert_dic['cert_info'],"): 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable [2018-11-27 09:50:37] [ERROR] 'NoneType' object does not support item assignment [2018-11-27 09:52:42] [ERROR] Reading Code Signing Certificate (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/cert_analysis.py, LINE 65 "dat = subprocess.check_output(args)"): Command '['/usr/bin/java', '-jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/tools/CertPrint.jar', '/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/uploads/1cede86d5ee2833204448a5d6831fed8/META-INF/1.RSA']' returned non-zero exit status 1. [2018-11-27 09:53:50] [ERROR] Saving to DB (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/db_interaction.py, LINE 218 "CERT_INFO=cert_dic['cert_info'],"): 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable [2018-11-27 09:53:50] [ERROR] Rendering to Template (/Users/martinfurholz/MobSF/StaticAnalyzer/views/android/db_interaction.py, LINE 105 "'certinfo': cert_dic['cert_info'],"): 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable [2018-11-27 09:53:50] [ERROR] 'NoneType' object does not support item assignment`
